short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension modifies the favicon for a site https://vadimklimenko.com/map/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension modifies the favicon for a site https://vadimklimenko.com/map/. After extension installed you can select the region. When there is an alarm for selected region the icon will be updated to notify user.
